metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29662 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible
metadata.Description: The Data::Validate::IP module through 0.29 for Perl does not properlyconsider extraneous zero characters at the beginning of an IP addressstring, which (in some situations) allows attackers to bypass accesscontrol that is based on IP addresses.

criterions.comment: libdata-validate-ip-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
